title: Who are your top 3 junglers  and why  ?
body:
Im trying to learn new junglers and im curious about people choices. My top 3 is: 

1- Jarvan IV{{champion:59}} : He have fast clearing time, good knock up and his ult is awesome to lock someone down. 
2- Nocturne{{champion:56}} : Clear even faster than J4, he can catch any champs and his ult is almost a guarantee kill. 
3- Nautilus{{champion:111}} : Tanky as hell, love his hook and passive combo and also his ult. 

I like Maokai and Amumu too.
Im not interested in over popular champs like Lee Sin and Kha'zix.
